nodes.text: Walkerskye Surveillance Network was a company that provided surveillance systems for a number of travel agencies, and a division of Sacul Industries Group.

This organization was mentioned only in an advertisement on the video screen found exclusively in the queue of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue at Tokyo Disneyland. Since the technologies advertised are already established as products of other companies, Walkerskye likely only provided equipment to companies. The company's name is an obvious reference to "Skywalker."
